name: COVID19VaccineRxNormCodesForExposureIdentification
title: COVID19 vaccine RxNorm codes for exposure identification
purpose: (Clinical Focus: COVID-19 vaccine RxNorm codes for identification of potential biologics-related adverse events.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element in the QDM category of Procedure/Intervention, Immunization, Medication, or Substance.),(Inclusion Criteria: COVID-19 vaccine RxNorm codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
